doc.title: Where's Daddy
doc.plot: When a young woman is woken by her hysterical sister to the news of their dead large male family dog, she is not surprised at her mother, and sister's usual vile behavior. Then she finds herself acting out in a most heinous matter and realizes she hasn't come to terms with her father who abandoned them fifteen years ago, till she says goodbye to her father by burying her dog in Coney Island.
